verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are holy, holy,
Lord, there is none like You.
You are holy, holy,
Glory to You alone.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are holy, holy,
Lord, there is none like You.
You are holy, holy,
Glory to You alone.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I'll sing Your praises forever
Deeper in love with You.
Here in Your courts
Where I'm close to Your throne,
I've found where I belong.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I'll sing Your praises forever
Deeper in love with You.
Here in Your courts
Where I'm close to Your throne,
I've found where I belong.
